name: 13th International Conference on Biotechnology
content: 13th International Conference on Biotechnology which will be held from June 27-28, 2024 in the beautiful city of London, UK. Biotechnology Conferences 2024 welcomes researchers, biotechnologists, CEOs, delegates, pharmaceutical industries, medical college faculties, healthcare industries, moderators, and exhibitors. Pulsus takes great delight in extending a warm welcome to all conference participants in Biotechnology Conferences 2024.
